alert.note: Alert for Kuskokwim Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 04 at 3:37PM AKST until December 05 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM AKST MONDAY... * LOCATION...Kuskokwim Delta from Kipnuk to Quinhagak * COASTAL FLOODING...Water levels are expected to rise 2 to 4 feet above normal highest tide. * TIMING...Until 3 AM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Minor inundation of low-lying coastal areas with the potential of water pushing up through cracks in the ice. Potential for minor beach erosion. Minor ice shoves are possible.
info.instruction: A coastal flood advisory indicates that onshore winds and tides will combine to generate flooding of low areas along the shore. Residents with interests along the coast should move items well above the normal high tide level.
